trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown when an operation on a workflow instance is invalid because the instance has been unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 當工作流程執行個體上的作業因為執行個體已卸載而無效時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The description of the application unloaded exception.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式卸載的例外狀況的描述。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> class with the specified text string description of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的例外狀況文字字串描述，建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: All the information required to serialize or deserialize the application unloaded exception object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或還原序列化應用程式卸載的例外狀況物件所需的所有資訊。

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of a given serialized stream and an additional caller-defined context.
trans-unit.target: 指定之序列化資料流的來源和目的端，和其他呼叫端定義的內容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> class with the context and serialization information required to retrieve data about this exception from a serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用擷取自序列化資料流且與此例外狀況有關的資料時所需的內容和序列化資訊，建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A description of the application unloaded exception.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式卸載的例外狀況的描述。

trans-unit.source: An exception that has a causal relationship to the application unloaded exception.
trans-unit.target: 與應用程式卸載的例外狀況有因果關係的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The application unloaded exception is thrown in response to the inner exception and can use information from the inner exception to handle the error more appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 已擲回應用程式卸載的例外狀況以回應內部例外狀況，且可以使用內部例外狀況的資訊以更適當地處理錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> class with the specified text string description of the exception and with a specified exception that has a causal relationship to the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的例外狀況文字字串描述和與 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> 有因果關係的指定例外狀況，建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A description of the application unloaded exception.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式卸載的例外狀況的描述。

trans-unit.source: A globally unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: 全域唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> class with the specified text string description of the exception and the specified unique identifier for it.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的例外狀況文字字串描述和指定的唯一識別碼，建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A description of the application unloaded exception.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式卸載的例外狀況的描述。

trans-unit.source: A globally unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: 全域唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: An exception that has a causal relationship to the application unloaded exception.
trans-unit.target: 與應用程式卸載的例外狀況有因果關係的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The application unloaded exception is thrown in response to the inner exception and can use information from the exception to handle the error more appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 已擲回應用程式卸載的例外狀況以回應內部例外狀況，且可以使用此例外狀況的資訊以更適當地處理錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /> class with the specified text string description of the exception, unique identifier for it, and the exception that is the cause of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的例外狀況文字字串描述、其唯一識別碼和造成 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" /><see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnloadedException" />的例外狀況，建立 類別的新執行個體。
